languages.text: "И вы ему верите? После всего, что он натворил на станции? Фелек лишь желает избавиться от наследницы и захватить власть в свои грязные руки. Не смейте порочить доброе имя Леди Кассии. Дитя — самое святое и невинное существо на всей станции".

traits.locale_text: "И вы ему верите? После всего, что он натворил на станции? Фелек лишь желает избавиться от наследницы и захватить власть в свои грязные руки. Не смейте порочить доброе имя Леди Кассии. Дитя — самое святое и невинное существо на всей станции".

languages.text: "And you believe him? After everything he has done to the station? Felek only wishes to dispose of the heir and take the reins in his bloodstained hands. Do not besmirch Lady Cassia's good name. The Child is the holiest and most innocent creature on this entire station."
languages.original_text: "И вы ему верите? После всего, что он натворил на станции? Фелек лишь желает избавиться от наследницы и захватить власть в свои грязные руки. Не смейте порочить доброе имя Леди Кассии. Дитя — самое святое и невинное существо на всей станции".

traits.locale_text: "And you believe him? After everything he has done to the station? Felek only wishes to dispose of the heir and take the reigns in his bloodstained hands. Dare not besmirch Lady Cassia's good name. The Child is the holiest and most innocent creature on the entire station."

"And you believe him? After everything he has done to the station? Felek only wishes to dispose of the heir and take the reigns in his bloodstained hands. Dare not besmirch Lady Cassia's good name. The Child is the holiest and most innocent creature on the entire station."

"And you believe him? After everything he has done to the station? Felek only wishes to dispose of the heir and take the reins in his bloodstained hands. Do not besmirch Lady Cassia's good name. The Child is the holiest and most innocent creature on this entire station."

"And you believe him? After everything he has done to the station? Felek only wishes to dispose of the heir and take the reins in his bloodstained hands. Do not besmirch Lady Cassia's good name. The Child is the holiest and most innocent creature on this entire station."

"And you believe him? After everything he has done to the station? Felek only wishes to dispose of the heir and take the reins in his bloodstained hands. Do not besmirch Lady Cassia's good name. The Child is the holiest and most innocent creature on this entire station."

languages.text: “你相信他的话吗？他对这座星站做了这样的事情，你还相信他吗？费雷克只想消灭家族的继承人，将权力的缰绳握在他沾满鲜血的手中。不要玷污卡西娅女士的美名，圣子是这座星站中最圣洁、最无辜的存在。”
languages.original_text: "And you believe him? After everything he has done to the station? Felek only wishes to dispose of the heir and take the reins in his bloodstained hands. Do not besmirch Lady Cassia's good name. The Child is the holiest and most innocent creature on this entire station."

traits.locale_text: “你相信他的话吗？他对这座星站做了这样的事情，你还相信他吗？费雷克只想消灭家族的继承人，将权力的缰绳握在他沾满鲜血的手中。不要玷污卡西娅女士的美名，那孩子是这座星站中最圣洁、最无辜的存在。”

languages.text: «¿Y usted le cree? ¿Después de lo que le ha hecho a la estación? Felek solo quiere eliminar a la heredera y tomar las riendas con sus manos ensangrentadas. No mancille el buen nombre de lady Cassia. La niña es la criatura más santa e inocente de toda esta estación».
languages.original_text: "And you believe him? After everything he has done to the station? Felek only wishes to dispose of the heir and take the reins in his bloodstained hands. Do not besmirch Lady Cassia's good name. The Child is the holiest and most innocent creature on this entire station."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y usted le cree? ¿Después de lo que le ha hecho a la estación? Felek solo quiere eliminar a la heredera y tomar las riendas con sus manos ensangrentadas. No mancille el buen nombre de lady Cassia. La niña es la criatura más santa e inocente de toda esta estación».

languages.text: 「彼を信じるのか？彼がステーションに対してしてきたことのすべてを？フェレックの望みは跡継ぎを始末して血に染まった手で手綱を取ることだけだ。カシア様の名を汚すな。あの『子ども』はこのステーションで最も神聖で最も罪のない生き物なのだ」
languages.original_text: "And you believe him? After everything he has done to the station? Felek only wishes to dispose of the heir and take the reins in his bloodstained hands. Do not besmirch Lady Cassia's good name. The Child is the holiest and most innocent creature on this entire station."

traits.locale_text: 「彼を信じるのか？彼がステーションに対してしてきたことのすべてを？フェレックの望みは跡継ぎを始末して血に染まった手で手綱を取ることだけだ。カシア様の名を汚すな。あの『子ども』はこのステーションで最も神聖で最も罪のない生き物なのだ」

languages.text: "Und Ihr glaubt ihm? Nach allem, was er der Station angetan hat? Felek will nur die Erbin loswerden und die Zügel selbst in die blutverschmierten Hände nehmen. Besudelt nicht Lady Cassias guten Namen. Das Kind ist das heiligste und unschuldigste Geschöpf auf dieser gesamten Station."
languages.original_text: "And you believe him? After everything he has done to the station? Felek only wishes to dispose of the heir and take the reins in his bloodstained hands. Do not besmirch Lady Cassia's good name. The Child is the holiest and most innocent creature on this entire station."

traits.locale_text: "Und Ihr glaubt ihm? Nach allem, was er der Station angetan hat? Felek will nur die Erbin loswerden und die Zügel selbst in die blutverschmierten Hände nehmen. Besudelt nicht Lady Cassias guten Namen. Das Kind ist das heiligste und unschuldigste Geschöpf auf dieser gesamten Station."

languages.text: « Et vous le croyez ? Après tout ce qu'il a fait sur la station ? Felek souhaite uniquement se débarrasser de l'héritière afin de saisir les rênes de sa poigne sanglante. Ne salissez pas le nom de dame Cassia. La sainte Enfant est la créature la plus innocente de toute la station. »
languages.original_text: "And you believe him? After everything he has done to the station? Felek only wishes to dispose of the heir and take the reins in his bloodstained hands. Do not besmirch Lady Cassia's good name. The Child is the holiest and most innocent creature on this entire station."

traits.locale_text: « Et vous le croyez ? Après tout ce qu'il a fait sur la station ? Felek souhaite uniquement se débarrasser de l'héritière afin de saisir les rênes de sa poigne sanglante. Ne salissez pas le nom de dame Cassia. La sainte Enfant est la créature la plus innocente de toute la station. »

languages.text: "Sen de inandın mı? İstasyona yaptıklarından sonra hem de. Felek'in tek istediği, vârisi saf dışı bırakıp ve ipleri o kanlı ellerine almak. Leydi Cassia'nın pirüpak ismine leke sürdürtmem. Çocuk, bu istasyondaki en kutsal, en masum varlıktır."
languages.original_text: "And you believe him? After everything he has done to the station? Felek only wishes to dispose of the heir and take the reins in his bloodstained hands. Do not besmirch Lady Cassia's good name. The Child is the holiest and most innocent creature on this entire station."

traits.locale_text: "Sen de inandın mı? İstasyona yaptıklarından sonra hem de. Felek'in tek istediği, vârisi saf dışı bırakıp ve ipleri o kanlı ellerine almak. Leydi Cassia'nın pirüpak ismine leke sürdürtmem. Çocuk, bu istasyondaki en kutsal, en masum varlıktır."
